summary:
Ever wanted to feel more badass?
Well this mod aim that way, by letting you throw battleaxes.
Add 15 Battleaxes that are throwable.
descriptionHtml:
[i][size=15][font=impact][color=#302217]T[/color][color=#34282C]i[/color][color=#3E3535]t[/color][color=#463E3f]a[/color][color=#4E4848]n[/color][color=#565051] T[/color][color=#5F5A59]h[/color][color=#666362]r[/color][color=#6E6A6B]o[/color][color=#787473]w[/color][/font][/size][/i] Â [i][b][color=grey]by Kmikaz3 and raden5[/color][/b][/i]

[size=3]Try these mods out!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16127/?]Arcane Fist - Unarmed Spell Combat[/url] for arcane monk.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67904/?]Battlemage Staves[/url] for epic staves battle.[/size]

[center][youtube]VlE2b5RkFTw[/youtube][/center]
[center]RavegedPyro[/center]


[color=red][size=6][font=impact]MUST READ[/font][/size][/color]
You must place this mod at the bottom of your load order to get it to work.

[b][size=5]Changelog[/size][/b]

V2.1
-Add script to remove spell from player menu
Note: Throwing spell will still be added to your menu but will be removed when you un-equip or change weapon.

V2.0:
-Add 3 DLCs Battleaxes

V1.0:
-Initial release

[b][size=5]How to get[/size][/b]
Craft at the forge with required material perks
To get a Titan Battleaxe you will need vanilla materials and a battleaxe of the same type.

Example : Titan Elven Battleaxe

2 x Iron Ingots
1 x Quicksilver Ingot
2 x Leather Strips
2 x Refined Moonstone
1 x Elven Battleaxe

or if you're lazy enough
Player.placeatme xx001328 1

[b][size=5]Technical
[/size][/b]There's 12 Titan Battleaxes in total with 3 more from DLCs.
The throwing damage output is based on DestructionPowerMod actor value, meaning it only improved by enchant or perk that increases destruction damage.
The melee damage are based on both Two-handed Batteaxes and Waraxes perks.

[b][size=5]Requirement[/size][/b]
Skyrim latest version
Update: Dawnguard and Dragonborn

[b][size=5]Optional[/size][/b]
For immersion Battleaxe on back.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6276/?]Get 1HD Weapons on Back TS Edition only Axe and Quiver by TS [/url]

[b][size=5]Bugs[/size][/b]
Careful about script lagging. If your game is script heavy, couple with a low fps, the script might take 2-3 oR more seconds before it fire.

[b][size=5]Credit[/size][/b]
Nifskope
Raden5 for script and NitransformController
Bethesda
Creation Kit
author: raden5 and Kmikaz3
